xQTLbiolinks 0.1.0
  • Reference

    Query gene information through all genes' information

    apiRef_genes.Rd

    users can use this function to search gene of interest

    Usage

    apiRef_genes(
  genes = "",
  geneType = "geneSymbol",
  gencodeVersion = "v26",
  genomeBuild = "GRCh38/hg38"
)

    Arguments

    genes

    Following gene types are supported:

    • Gene symbol.

      A character string or a character vector (case ignored). like: "tp53","naDK","SDF4".

    • Gencode/ensemble id (versioned or unversioned).

      A character string or a character vector (case ignored). like: "ENSG00000210195.2","ENSG00000078808".

    • Entrez gene ID.

      A integer string or a integer vectors. like: 51150,5590,4509.

    • geneCategory.

      When choose "geneCategory", "genes" must be chosen from following gene category:

      • protein coding

      • antisense

      • lincRNA

      • unprocessed pseudogene

      • miRNA

      • transcribed unprocessed pseudogene

      • snRNA

      • processed pseudogene

      • processed transcript

      • TEC

      • transcribed unitary pseudogene

      • transcribed processed pseudogene

      • sense intronic

      • misc RNA

      • snoRNA

      • scaRNA

      • rRNA

      • unitary pseudogene

      • 3prime overlapping ncRNA

      • polymorphic pseudogene

      • bidirectional promoter lncRNA

      • sense overlapping

      • pseudogene

      • IG V pseudogene

      • scRNA

      • IG C gene

      • IG J gene

      • IG V gene

      • sRNA

      • ribozyme

      • vaultRNA

      • non coding

      • TR J gene

      • TR C gene

      • TR V gene

      • TR V pseudogene

      • TR D gene

      • IG C pseudogene

      • macro lncRNA

      • TR J pseudogene

      • IG D gene

      • IG J pseudogene

      • IG pseudogene

      • Mt tRNA

      • Mt rRNA

    geneType

    A character string. Types of queried genes. Options: "geneSymbol" (default), "gencodeId", "entrezId";

    gencodeVersion

    A character string. Two version are supported: "v26" (default) and "v19"

    genomeBuild

    A character string. "GRCh38/hg38"(default) for gencodeVersion "v26", "GRCh37/hg19" for gencodeVersion "v19"

    Value

    A data.table of queried gene information. including following columns:

    • genes. Input genes

    • geneSymbol. Gene symbol.

    • gencodeId. Gencode/ensemble id (versioned).

    • entrezGeneId. Entrez gene ID.

    • geneType. Gene type.

    • chromosome. Note: "chr" is added in gencode v26,

    • start.

    • end.

    • strand.

    • tss. Transcriptional start site.

    • gencodeVersion. Gencode Version.

    • genomeBuild. Genome version.

    • description.

    On this page
